fire.title: Fire Cluster — The Primordial Hub
fire.body:
Fire emerges not as beginning but as the first high-connectivity node—a natural phenomenon captured and sustained. Constraint profile: oxygen, fuel, ignition energy.

Fire immediately spawns parallel chains: cooking (biology fork—caloric density enables brain expansion), warmth (habitat expansion), light (temporal liberation), material transformation (ceramics, glass, metallurgy).

energy.title: Energy Systems — Constraint Cascade
energy.body:
Fire's offspring: steam (fire + water containment), combustion (fire + mechanical precision + refined fuel), electricity (magnetism + motion + conductive materials).

Each step multiplies constraints: steam requires metallurgy for pressure vessels; electricity requires copper mining, rubber insulation, magnetic theory. Energy density becomes the master constraint.

tools.title: Tool Chain — Recursive Self-Improvement
tools.body:
Stone tools predate fire—the first manufactured edges. Tools make tools: hammers shape chisels, chisels shape dies, dies stamp precision parts.

The lathe is a phase transition: round symmetry enables bearings, shafts, threads. Machine tools hit self-replication: machines that build machines.

bio.title: Biological Chain — Wet Substrate
bio.body:
Agriculture emerges from observation + seasonal memory + seed storage. Constraint: arable land, water, labor. Spawns irrigation, selective breeding, fermentation.

Medicine branches: herbalism → chemistry → germ theory → antibiotics → gene editing. CRISPR loops back to information cluster (DNA as code).

info.title: Information Chain — Pattern Persistence
info.body:
Language is the substrate—symbols externalize cognition. Writing decouples information from biological memory. Printing enables mass replication; telegraph breaks distance constraint.

Transistor is a mega-hub: spawns all digital technology. Constraint cascade: silicon purity, photolithography precision, quantum tunneling limits.

materials.title: Materials Chain — Atomic Architecture
materials.body:
Metallurgy spawns the age cascade: bronze → iron → steel. Each material unlocks new constraint envelopes: temperature tolerance, tensile strength, conductivity.

Semiconductors become the bridge to information: doped silicon enables transistors. Graphene and metamaterials hint at programmable matter.

social.title: Social Systems — Coordination Protocols
social.body:
Writing enables record-keeping → accounting → money → markets. Coordination at scale emerges: corporations, legal systems, democracies.

Universities become invention accelerators—back-propagating to every technical cluster. Social systems are meta-inventions: inventions that produce inventions.

space.title: Space & Scale — Boundary Expansion
space.body:
Glass enables optical instruments: telescope (macro-scale), microscope (micro-scale). Observation drives theory; theory enables rocketry.

Satellites create the orbital infrastructure layer: GPS, communications, Earth observation. Space becomes the new constraint frontier—energy, radiation, vacuum.

agi.title: AGI Hub — Dense Convergence
agi.body:
Not an endpoint—a hyperdense node where all chains converge. Requires: massive compute (energy), precision fabrication (tools), neural architecture insights (biology), algorithmic theory (information).

AGI becomes a new fire: a general-purpose enabler spawning unpredictable chains. The constraint envelope: alignment, energy, interpretability, governance.
